sentence.Network_en: It looked as though he had learnt from them neither charity nor loving kindness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看起来并没有从书中学到宽宏大度或是仁爱善良的品质.

sentence.Network_en: Here again the psalmist speaks of God's boundless loving - kindness and mercy.
sentence.Network_cn: (十七节)作诗的人,在这里,重新又说到那无边无涯的慈爱和怜悯.

sentence.Network_en: The moral is: Loving - kindness makes the poorest house into the richest home.
sentence.Network_cn: 这则故事的寓意是: 慈爱可以将最贫困的家庭转变为最富有的家庭.

list.abs: Grandma was a kind lovely lady ., 奶奶是个仁慈可爱的女人.
Goldfish are lovely kind of fish ., 金鱼是可爱的种鱼.
the practice of loving kindness and compassion is very practical and easy to accomplish .而对仁爱与慈悲的修持则是十分实际而容易实现的方法。
迈克尔杰克... ... Then Make A Change 然后作出改变 Kind Of Love 爱的牺牲品 It's Time That I Realize 是时候让我了解这一切了.

means.word_mean: 1. tender kindness motivated by a feeling of affection
